response.overview: A devoted woman to her husband and children, Morticia is the pale glue that holds her family together. Friendly, malicious and passionately in love with his wife, family man Gomez always maintains his entrepreneurial spirit. The children of the family are also very unique individuals. Wednesday, the smart girl with her long braids and stinging humor, and 10-year-old Pugsley, who chases after the biggest threats and dangers she can find. However, the members of the house are not limited to these. Fester, the family's crazy macaw, is good-natured, cheerful, and can cause mayhem in every way, while Granny adores her grandchildren, who love the sugar cookies she bakes into shapes like bats and skulls. As the family is in the middle of preparing for their upcoming celebration, Margaux Needler shows up. Margaux Needler is the queen of a beloved reality show and is committed to suburban pastel perfection. How will these two different fronts meet?
response.title: Addams Ailesi 1
